bibl.title: The Magdalen Papyrus. A Reply.
bibl.note: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). - Reply on: D.C. PARKER, Was Matthew Written before 50 CE? The Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew, ibidem 107 (1995) pp. 40-43. - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 42 (1995-1996) No. 980a.
bibl.seg: THIEDE Carsten Peter, The Magdalen Papyrus. A Reply.

P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). - Reply on: D.C. PARKER, Was Matthew Written before 50 CE? The Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew, ibidem 107 (1995) pp. 40-43. - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 42 (1995-1996) No. 980a.
